description: Sasha was made a promise before the shoot...that there would be no cold water BUT she must let us do whatever else I want to her! Foolishly, she agreed! Hung above the Houdini tank in a cage she awaits her fate and deals with her fear of heights and the apprehension of full submersion! This is one of our best scenes to date, seeing Sasha slowly submerged in a cage is priceless!
title: Sasha Monet
